actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Census and Population.
Committee on Post Office and Civil Service discharged.
Mr. Sawyer asked unanimous consent to discharge from committee and consider.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Senate Committee on Judiciary discharged by Unanimous Consent.
Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

official_title: Designating the third Sunday of August 1991, as "National Senior Citizens Day".

summary.text: Authorizes and requests the President to designate the third Sunday of August 1991 as National Senior Citizens Day.
